attributes.action: stop using the environment as an excuse to impose regressive stealth taxes
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All monies raised from supposed "green taxes" should be ringfenced for environmental projects. More thought needs to be given as to how these taxes are raised so as not to adversely affect poorer members of society who are being as environmentally responsible as possible.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
